description: Variation of Condition 6 (Opening Hours) of Planning Permission 19/00520/FUL (Change of use from A1 to A3 with the installation of plant and ventilation and alterations to shopfront and erection of retractable canopy extension with rear seating area.). Due to the current COVID-19 pandemic, the premises would like to benefit from extended hours, from 11am to 11pm to change to open from 11am to 01:00am with last orders to be given at 12:30am and no customers after 12:30am.This to be redacted in the future depending on the restriction situation in the UK.
decision_conditions: The proposed extended use of the premises is likely to result in noise and disturbance that would cause demonstrable harm to the residential amenity of neighbouring occupiers. Therefore the proposal would not accord with policies CS8 and DM10 of the Council's adopted LDF Core Strategy April 2012.

The information submitted pursuant Condition 5 (Fire Safety Strategy) of planning permission 22/00968/HOU (Erection of single-storey front and side extension, installation of 1 no front and 1 no side rooflights and internal alteration) - has been assessed by Officers and is considered acceptable.
